metadata.dc:author: Díaz Calleja, E
Rodríguez Torres, A
Francia Bengoechea, A
metadata.dc:description: The authors make a study of 46 urological patients (16 control and 30 neoplasia persons) determining the R.C.P. before and after the operations. The positive results obtained (77%) should lead to the said test becoming routine in uro-genital neoplasias.
metadata.dc:title: Utilidad de la proteina C reactiva en las neoplasias urológicas.
[The role of C reactive protein in urological neoplasms].
